name: Skiing Frenzy
description:
It's skiing day! Skiing Frenzy is a 2D top-down, retro-style ski game where you can play Slalom and Free Ski modes. Both modes are set in an endless and randomly generated world with different obstacles such as trees and rocks. You can also pop three different kinds of balloons in your way down, each one giving it a specific benefit or limitation. Down below you can learn more about it!

Main features:

> Slalom Mode
- Endless and randomly generated map with obstacles and balloons;
- 32 flags to finish the game randomly positioned;
- Timer to mark how fast you can get all the flags;
- Time leaderboard;
- No lives/continues - if you collide with an obstacle, you go back to the beginning.


> Free Ski Mode (Survival)
- Endless and randomly generated map with the same obstacles and balloons as Slalom Mode;
- Distance achieved (meters) counter and leaderboard;
- Boss that gets you if you stay too slow;
- 3 lives for collisions with obstacles.

> Balloons
Balloons are an essential part of the game and are present both on Slalom and Free Ski modes. There are four kinds of balloons:
- Red: gives you 5s of invincibility against obstacles;
- Yellow: gives you +10 maximum speed;
- Dark Purple: gives you -10 maximum speed.
